dialogText: So, here's the deal.$It's been quite a while since I've banished any of these. It's not often anyone is able to stay in this world as long as you have and be so troublesome at the same time...$Anyway, I'm pretty sure all that junk that dropped on the floor needs to be moved...$Also, I'm pretty sure the letters 'Q', 'E', 'W', 'S', 'A', and 'D' have something to do with manipulating that junk once your grubby hands have a hold of it.
